channel.title: Mac Tips on My Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Mac Tips on My Hugo

item.title: Screenshot on Mac
item.description: capture shortcuts action entire screen Shift+Command+3 select area Shift+Command+4 cursor to cross, drag selection area then release a window Shift+Command+4 press space, cursor to camera, click target window Note: files are saved on the desktop to capture to clipboard, add “Control” with shortcuts in the same time, e.g. Shift+Command+4+Control.
